channel.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
channel.description:
![Spag|120x120](upload://yPsbX5t6rq0u6FKoK36KyomKB1t.png)
<big> Featured Auxy Artist #26: @SpaghettiSauce </big>
<big>S</big>paghettiSauce is a young American artist, who says he plays trumpet and fiddles around on the piano badly.
**Piano?** "I have a keyboard with the off button not working, so I have to unplug it whenever I want to turn it off. Even though I have to do that, I still use it a lot."
**What's your fav genre?** "Just make stuff. My favorite genre is music."
**If you could collab with any artist in the world?** "Herbie Hancock. Probably not the best choice but it would be fun, mixing electronic with jazz, and maybe teaching him a little." :joy:
**Week starting: 25 June, 2018.** :spag: Please listen to at least one of his tracks (or more) :spag: Provide at least one Soundcloud comment / feedback about his music during their week. :spag: Comment in this thread once you've provided any feedback. :spag: If you want to be featured, remember to comment for others!
Check out his tracks: :soundcloud: [Soundcloud Tracks](https://soundcloud.com/spaghetti_sauce/tracks) :soundcloud: [Soundcloud EP: A New Start](https://soundcloud.com/spaghetti_sauce/sets/a-new-start) - Released 1 Jan 2018.
:spotify: [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6pA3RbSHKzNVJIJKEJZdfk?si=fOVoXQMJQwqjMqL2wHInEQ).
If you want to be in the weekly draw [add your name.](https://disco.auxy.co/t/forum-member-of-the-week-who-wants-to-be-involved/5518)

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
You know what‚Äôs great? Working 6 days out of the entire week and not getting to listen to @SpaghettiSauce‚Äôs songs :<<

I‚Äôll listen soon alright? I‚Äôm sorry I missed out again due to work.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Hey Spag-man ,

Just listed to a bunch of your tracks. My favourite parts were:

  • The atmosphere and bass in 2-16-05
  • The chords in Radiance
  • The Intro and dramatic parts of Synthesis

A couple of times there was too much repetition. Like, when a new section of the track starts you do a transition and introduce new sounds which is good, but exactly the same melody keeps playing throughout. Maybe you could copy the melody and make a few more versions of it instead of using exactly the same melody pattern over and over. It‚Äôs actually quite fun to turn off your melody altogether - even if it‚Äôs good and try making variations of whole new melodies. Maybe the next step in your musical journey is to investigate song structure, which is something I need to improve on.

Thanks for being our FMOTW.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Hey @SpaghettiSauce! I‚Äôm currently in the process of listening to your tracks, and I‚Äôd just like to say that I‚Äôve noticed your mixes getting a lot more full and interesting. I‚Äôve really liked the development of your tracks! I love the chords and arpeggios of Oxygen. Has a great vibe to it - simple but pretty. One of my favorites is 2-16-05. Amazing work with that. The bass that kicks in is just perfect. The nice little melody is short but sweet. Overall a very simple yet stunning track. I love the ambient progressive feel of it. It sounds like something I would enjoy making, so if you‚Äôre ever up to collaborate on some ambient house-y stuff‚Ä¶ let me know. I love the path you‚Äôre taking with you‚Äôre new stuff, and I‚Äôm excited to hear more! Keep up the cool chords, too. They‚Äôre great. Congrats on FMotW, and keep on writing great stuff!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
item.dc:creator: Stigmo
item.description:
@SpaghettiSauce
Ok, first of all, I think you really improved over the last few months. Radiance is significantly ‚Äòbetter‚Äô than the stuff you uploaded like 6 months ago, so good job on that! I noticed that you make different styles and genres of music, which is great. My favorite track of yours is definitely Radiance; the intro is great, and I really like the experimental wubs in the drop, and the little plucks at the end of the drop work really well too, and the same goes for the vocal, that‚Äôs dope. Unfortunately I didn‚Äôt really have time to listen to all of your songs, so I can‚Äôt really give you a lot of feedback. I do feel that the drop in Coco Beach lacks power, so it could use a little sub bass imo.
Overall, you make solid music, and you‚Äôre great as a person too, so keep it up my man!

Read full topic
item.source: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce

item.title: Forum Member of the Week - 26 - SpaghettiSauce
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
I never really listened to your stuff until now, and I have to say, I‚Äôm pleasantly surprised! Your synth work in Radiance is impressive. No offense, but you seem to have a tendency to keep scenes the same for a bit too long without making changes, but that‚Äôs an easy fix. I left you some other comments on Soundcloud which you can check out. Thanks for being FMOTW!

Read full topic
